Package org.catlady.client.controller

Class InteractionController

java.lang.Object
org.catlady.client.controller.InteractionController
public class InteractionController extends Object
Management of GUI-produced messages, which are put in the queue, also used to retrieve additional information for GUI related purposes.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor

    InteractionController(BlockingQueue<Message> messageQueue, ClientStatus clientStatus)
    Create the controller providing the queue to put messages in and the inital state of the client

  • Constructor Details

    • InteractionController

      public InteractionController(BlockingQueue<Message> messageQueue, ClientStatus clientStatus)
      Create the controller providing the queue to put messages in and the inital state of the client
      Parameters:
      messageQueue - the queue of messages to send to the server
      clientStatus - the state of the model of the client

  • Method Details

    • sendRequest

      public void sendRequest(Message message)
      Puts messages in the message queue.
      Parameters:
      message - message to be put in the queue

    • createLobby

      public void createLobby(String lobbyName, String creatorPlayerName, boolean isPublic)
      Send request for creating a lobby.
      Parameters:
      lobbyName - the name of the lobby
      creatorPlayerName - the creator of the lobby
      isPublic - true if public, false if private

    • joinLobby

      public void joinLobby(String lobbyName, String myName, Optional<Integer> code)
      Join an existing lobby.
      Parameters:
      lobbyName - the lobby name
      myName - the name of the player that wants to join the lobby
      code - code for accessing a private lobby

    • getPublicLobbies

      public void getPublicLobbies()
      get all public lobbies.

    • leaveLobby

      public void leaveLobby()
      leave the lobby you are in.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(String message)
      Send a message in the lobby chat.
      Parameters:
      message - the content of the message.

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Start the game after verifying it can be started.

    • drawCards

      public void drawCards(RowColumnIdentifier line)
      Draw a line of cards from the matrix.
      Parameters:
      line - the line to draw.

    • playSprayBottle

      public void playSprayBottle(Card playedCard, RowColumnIdentifier position)
      Play a spray bottle card.
      Parameters:
      playedCard - the card played.
      position - the position in which you want to move the cat token.

    • playLostCats

      public void playLostCats(List<Card> playedCards, GameAction action, String strayCatName)
      Play a couple of lost card cats.
      Parameters:
      playedCards - the cards played.
      action - the action to perform, either get victory point token or stray cat.
      strayCatName - the name of the stray cat wanted, not needed if getting victory point token.

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn()
      End the current player turn.

    • sendCatCardsForScoreEvaluation

      public void sendCatCardsForScoreEvaluation()
      send player cats in end game after feeding them.

    • canStartGame

      public boolean canStartGame()
      Verify if the player can start the game.
      Returns:
      true if the game can start, false otherwise

    • canPlaySprayBottle

      public boolean canPlaySprayBottle(Card playedCard, RowColumnIdentifier position)
      Verify if spray bottle can be played.
      Parameters:
      playedCard - the card played, to pass is required to be a spray bottle card.
      position - the position in which you want to move the cat token, to pass is required to be different from current position.
      Returns:
      true if it can be played, false otherwise.

    • canPlayLostCats

      public boolean canPlayLostCats(List<Card> playedCards, GameAction action, String strayCatName)
      Verify if lost cards can be played.
      Parameters:
      playedCards - the cards to play, to pass must be two lost cat cards.
      action - the action to do.
      strayCatName - the name of the stray cat to obtain.
      Returns:
      true if they can be played, false otherwise.

    • isMyTurn

      public boolean isMyTurn()
      check if it is player turn.
      Returns:
      true if its current player turn, false otherwise.

    • isLobbyPresent

      public boolean isLobbyPresent()
      Check if the player is in a lobby.
      Returns:
      true if a lobby is found, false otherwise.

    • getCards

      public List<Card> getCards(CardType cardType, int amount)
      Retrieve from the player hand a certain amount of a certain type of cards.
      Parameters:
      cardType - the type of the card to retrieve
      amount - the number of cards wanted
      Returns:
      the list of card founded, if there are not enough card return a lesser amount.

    • getCatCardFromName

      public CatCard getCatCardFromName(String cardName)
      Retrieve a specific cat card from the player cats.
      Parameters:
      cardName - the name of the card.
      Returns:
      the requested card.

    • getPlayerFood

      public Map<FoodType,Integer> getPlayerFood()
      Get the player food reserve.
      Returns:
      the food reserve of the player.

    • setPlayerFood

      public void setPlayerFood(FoodType foodType, int amount)
      Change the food amount of the player in relation of a feeding event of a cat.
      Parameters:
      foodType - the food used.
      amount - the amount of food used.
